text: Female is dark slate - grey with white throat streaked dark grey and otherwise ochraceous underparts .Black wings and tail with white markings as in male .Voice Series of up to 20 defined pook or faster kikuk notes .Distribution and population Cercomacra carbonaria is limited to middle sections of the rio Branco and some of its tributaries in Roraima , extreme north Brazil , and adjacent Guyana .
